data.title: The Best of Cordwainer Smith Edited by J. J. Pierce
data.meta_description: Softcover, New York: Ballantine Books, 1975. Very Good+. Here in one volume are the 12 most important stories of the unique writer who fused wonder and poetry into imaginative tales that transcend both science and fiction. Ships same or next business day. Spine is slightly skewed. Light reading crease on front cover. Small bumps on spine ends. Tiny creases on corners. Very light damp stains on head edges of page 345 to back cover.
